dc:title: Views and News
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Contrasts ugliness (a street fight) and beauty (a recitation of the psalms at the house by a friend). Mentions visitors, a birth, a death, and a day of recollection.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 370 1941-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
